contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} '''Quick Response Engine''' was a [[planning]] and [[Scheduling (computing)|scheduling]] program developed for the [[AS/400]] computer series. The program was developed by the Acacia Technologies division of [[Computer Associates]] in 1996. In 2002 the group was sold to [[SSA Global Technologies]]. [[Category:AS/400]] [[Category:Automated planning and scheduling]] [[Category:Computer companies of the United States]] [[Category:Defunct software companies]] {{Technology-stub}}
